results.content: Yes, a good match.  I am a skilled photo editor and new to WP and discouraged to find that I am really struggling to fit my content in a pro theme, which has poorly written instructions and does not response to help requests - I realize this is not WP's problem..it's mine!  I decided to take a long break and just sit and go through the basic set up videos and try again with the theme instructions.  The real problem for beginners with instructions is that the majority of them are written by highly skilled people who move through material with the speed of pros.  Thanks for the simple, slow vido=eo!!

results.content:
It is a good introduction to WordPress. Enjoying the course. Just a note, I had to spend a lot of time figuring out how to allow site changes & uploads.
I am using a local install on VirtualBox VMs (Centos & Ubuntu). Would've been nice to have a video, or two, on how to install, configure & setup Wordpress (permissions) to allow a. uploads, b. changing themes, c. plugin installs
results.content_html:
